body.p: Horse Sale 2 Miles northwest of New Lisbon ½ mile north of highway 12-16 Wed., March 22 at 12:30 o’clock 24 Head good choice farm horses, weight from 12 to 16 hundred well matched teams, mares in foal, some colts, a few cheaper horses. Guaranteed to be right in every way or money refunded. Leo McKenna, Owner Norton Christensen, auctioneers Thorp Finance Corporation, represented by Art Wells, Mauston, Clerk
